title.value: Организационно-технологические основы технического обслуживания и ремонта машин в молочном скотоводстве
Organizational and technological fundamentals of maintenance and repair of machines in dairy farming
Organizational and technological fundamentals of maintenance and repair of machines in dairy farming

person.name: Kovalev, L. I., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph presents the foundations ensuring the efficiency of utilization of machines and equipment used on cattle farms and complexes; determines the most important principles, standards and tools defining a system of preventive maintenance and repair of machines and equipment for animal husbandry; shows the forms of service; analyzes distribution of the work between service agencies and agricultural producers; describes the ways to reduce the complexity and costs of maintenance and repair of equipment in dairy farming. General information concepts of the development of milk and dairy production are analyzed; the requirements for the milk production are enumerated; milk composition is analyzed and milk classification is made. Comprehensive analysis of consumption of dairy products in Belarus and in the world along with analysis of production and trade of dairy products in the world is presented. Dynamics of production, export and import of dairy products in Belarus is evaluated; the level of milk production in the Republic of Belarus on the basis of comprehensive mechanization and automation of farms is researched. Milk production hygiene, general concepts and definitions of technical service is investigated; analysis of production and technical base for the maintenance and repair of vehicles and equipment for livestock management is made. The main directions of the development of technical maintenance of livestock equipment are determined; categorization methods of maintenance and repair of machines and equipment in animal husbandry industry are suggested.
